attributes.action: Make the government step in and look at the extortionate price of insurance
attributes.additional_details: I believe he government need to step in and actually look at how insurance companies come up with their rates and actually look at creating a system that is fair and affordable across the country for everyone.
attributes.background: Like most people in the UK I have been stung by the extortionate and ever rising costs of insurance, insurance companies seem to be able to charge whatever they want as it is a legal requirement for road users to have it.
